original_title: Tehching Hsieh: One Year Performance, Outdoor Piece 1981 - 1982
overview: In his third one-year performance piece, from 26 September 1981 through 26 September 1982, Hsieh spent one year outside, not entering buildings or shelter of any sort, including cars, trains, airplanes, boats, or tents. He moved around New York City with a packbag and a sleeping bag.
title: Tehching Hsieh: One Year Performance, Outdoor Piece 1981 - 1982
